SENT.plain: We report a child with acute lymphocytic leukaemia who developed simultaneous osteonecrosis of vertebrae and cerebral thrombosis during L-asparaginase therapy
Fibrinogen, antithrombin III and plasminogen were decreased
Fresh frozen plasma in addition to antithrombin III concentrates were used to replenish these haemostatic proteins
L-asparaginase induced coagulopathy may cause osteonecrosis
